MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G14 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Dumbarton Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.09pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Kelso Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:21pm on Monday, 05 April 2021
